product_name: Overland Equipment Belvedere Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: The Overland Equipment Belvedere shoulder bag organizes your daily necessities. Zip-close main pocket features a quilted sleeve that keeps your tablet close at hand and protected. Zippered main compartment also features 1 drop-in pocket. Front zippered organizer pocket is sized to hold travel documents; key fob. Dedicated exterior quick-access cell phone pocket on front. Overland Equipment Belvedere shoulder bag is made from a durable, water-resistant nylon fabric and has an adjustable shoulder strap.
short_description: The Overland Equipment Belvedere shoulder bag organizes your daily necessities. Zip-close main pocket features a quilted sleeve that keeps your tablet close at hand and protected.
